tool_description: Creates archives of directory structures with compression, encryption, and versioning capabilities for backup and distribution purposes.

source_directories.description: List of directory paths to include in the archive

archive_name.description: Name for the created archive file

archive_format.description: Archive format: zip, tar, tar.gz, tar.bz2, 7z

compression_level.description: Compression level (0-9, where 9 is maximum compression)

include_metadata.description: Whether to include directory metadata in the archive

exclude_empty.description: Whether to exclude empty directories from the archive

version_tag.description: Version tag to append to archive name

error_messages: Invalid archive format: Use one of [zip, tar, tar.gz, tar.bz2, 7z] for archive_format.
Invalid compression level: compression_level must be between 0 and 9.
Source directory not found: One or more source directories do not exist.
Archive creation failed: Unable to create archive due to filesystem or permission errors.
Insufficient disk space: Not enough space available to create the archive.
usage: Provide source_directories array and archive_name, optionally configure archive_format, compression_level, and other archiving options. The tool creates an archive and returns details.

archive_path.description: Full path to the created archive file

archive_size.description: Size of the created archive in bytes

compressed_directories.description: Number of directories included in the archive

compression_ratio.description: Compression ratio achieved (original size / compressed size)

creation_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the archive was created
